item.title: Episode 4: Movin' and Groovin'
item.description: Here are the links to the resources for today’s episode: Join our Scratch class! Visit CodeCrew on Facebook, Twitter, tiktok, and Instagram! Check out YouTube’s free audio library! They’ve got all kinds of cool sounds to add to your projects. DO THE #CodeCrewChallenge!! @_codecrew Show us your ##CodeCrewChallenge !!! Make sure to watch CodeCrew TV on SCS C19, Thursdayâ€™s 9am. ##codecrewtv ##codecrew ##memphis ##tech ##code ##foryou ##fyp

item.title: Episode 3: Dancing and Debugging
item.description: Here are the links to the resources for today’s episode: Digital office hours are Friday, 5/15/2020 at 1 PM Central time! Add the event to your calendar or join the Google Hangout directly here! Join our Scratch class! Check out Debugging Challenge 4 and Debugging Challenge 5 and try your hand at figuring out what’s wrong with the code! Can you improve the Nyan Cat game? Visit CodeCrew on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram!
